<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Greater Nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=309)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The enormous greater nightmare is a more dangerous variety of nightmare, particularly valued for its ability to invade other realities with its rider.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 28

**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Greater Nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=309)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 244</row>

**Perception** +22; darkvision

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Smoke** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206)) 20 feet. The nightmare continually exhales black smoke that creates concealment in an aura around it. Nightmares and their riders can see through this smoke. A creature that begins its turn in the area becomes sickened 2 (DC 28 Fortitude negates) and is then temporarily immune sickness from the smoke for 1 minute. The nightmare, its rider, any creature currently holding its breath (or that does not need to breathe), and any creature immune to poison are immune to the aura’s sickened effect but not the concealment.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 200

**Resistances**
fire 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 60 feet, fly 120 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +24 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+11 piercing plus 1d6 evil

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d8+11 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil and 2d8 fire

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 30
- **7th**
[Ethereal Jaunt](/Spells.aspx?ID=105) (self and rider only), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self and rider only)

**Flaming Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The greater nightmare Strides or Flies up to triple its Speed. Its hooves burst with intense flame, dealing 6d6 fire damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save) once to each creature other than the greater nightmare’s rider that the greater nightmare moves adjacent to during its gallop.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Large or smaller, hoof, DC 30

</column>

name: Greater Nightmare
